column4: good evening, I got a cardreader in my PC and last week it accepted a SD card without problems, but now it won't read a Sony SDHC card
any method to check the cardreader, i.e. if it is recognized by ubuntu?

First thing I would try would be "sudo parted -l" to see if the card is seen as a drive, if it's not then you can try "lsusb" or "lspci" to see to see if it's being detected at any level, and maybe look at "dmesg" before and after inserting a car / plugging in the reader itself (if it's removable).
Guest42157 I am afraid the card reader as such isn't recognized
